    public OrderId(int value)
    {
        Value = value;
    }


    public int Value { get; }


    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IEquatable{{T}}"/>
    public bool Equals(OrderId other) => Value.Equals(other.Value);

    public override bool Equals(object? obj)
    {
        if (ReferenceEquals(null, obj))
            return false;
        return obj is OrderId other && Equals(other);
    }


    public override int GetHashCode() => Value.GetHashCode();

    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IComparable{{TSelf}}"/>
    public int CompareTo(OrderId other) => Value.CompareTo(other.Value);

    public static bool TryParse(string? input, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider, out OrderId result)

            result = new(value);
            return true;

        else
        {
            result = default;
            return false;
        }

#if NET8_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IUtf8SpanParsable{{TSelf}}.Parse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan{{byte}}, global::System.IFormatProvider?)"/>
    public static OrderId Parse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Text, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider) => new(int.Parse(utf8Text, provider));
#endif

#if NET8_0_OR_GREATER
    /// <inheritdoc cref="global::System.IUtf8SpanParsable{{TSelf}}.TryParse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan{{byte}}, global::System.IFormatProvider?, out TSelf)"/>
    public static bool TryParse(global::System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> utf8Text, global::System.IFormatProvider? provider, out OrderId result)
    {
        if (int.TryParse(utf8Text, provider, out var value))
        {
            result = new OrderId(value);
            return true;
        }

        result = default;
        return false;
    }
#endif


    public override string ToString() => Value.ToString();

    public static OrderId Parse(string input) => new(int.Parse(input));

    public static bool operator ==(OrderId left, OrderId right) => left.Equals(right);

    public static bool operator !=(OrderId left, OrderId right) => !(left == right);

    public static bool operator>(OrderId a, OrderId b) => a.CompareTo(b) > 0;

    public static bool operator <(OrderId a, OrderId b) => a.CompareTo(b) < 0;

    public static bool operator >=(OrderId a, OrderId b) => a.CompareTo(b) >= 0;

    public static bool operator <=(OrderId a, OrderId b) => a.CompareTo(b) <= 0;

    /// <summary>
    /// Implicitly converts a <see cref="Int32"/> to a <see cref="OrderId"/>.

    public static implicit operator OrderId(int value) => new OrderId(value);

    /// <summary>
    /// Explicitly converts a <see cref="OrderId"/> to its underlying <see cref="Int32"/> value.

    public static explicit operator int (OrderId value) => value.Value;
